Nodes.name: Raymond
Nodes.text: Tom Nook? Hey there. My name is Raymond.

Nodes.name: Raymond
Nodes.text: Fine little piece of land here. It feels like a small community already.

Nodes.name: Raymond
Nodes.text: When I stopped by to visit Maple not long ago, I knew this would be a great place to move to.

Nodes.name: Raymond
Nodes.text: Tortimer seems like a great guy and was really accommodating.

Nodes.name: Raymond
Nodes.text: I don't want take up too much of your time, but you are welcome to stop by my place if you'd like. Pleasure meeting you.
